fr.cnrs.iees.io.parsing

Interface TextGrammar

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphExporter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphmlExporter, OmugiGraphExporter

    public interface TextGrammar
    This interface defines the conventions used to save graph elements as text. For example, which delimiter for which kind of token, etc.

    CAUTION: change in this file will corrupt ALL SAVED configuration files.

    Author:
    gignoux

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char[] DIM_BLOCK_DELIMITERS
      delimiter for dimensions
      static char DIM_ITEM_SEPARATOR

      delimiter for property lists
      static char PROPERTY_LIST_SEPARATOR
      separator for property lists
      static char PROPERTY_SEPARATOR
      separator for property (between key and value)
      static char[] TABLE_BLOCK_DELIMITERS
      delimiter for tables
      static char TABLE_ITEM_SEPARATOR
      separator for table items
